faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions

pricing.question: How are transport costs calculated?
pricing.answer: Costs depend on distance, weight, volume and desired service level. Special transports and express shipments have individual rates. We're happy to provide you with a non-binding quote.

coverage.question: Which countries do you transport to?
coverage.answer: We serve all of Europe with focus on Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Benelux, Poland and Northern Italy. For worldwide transport, we work with reliable partners.

insurance.question: How is my shipment insured?
insurance.answer: All transports are insured by default. Coverage depends on declared goods value. Additional insurance can be arranged for valuable goods.

tracking.question: Can I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: Yes, you receive a tracking number for monitoring. For critical transports, we offer live tracking with GPS location.

dangerousGoods.question: Do you also transport dangerous goods?
dangerousGoods.answer: Yes, we are ADR-certified and transport dangerous goods of all classes. This requires special advance notifications and documentation.

deliveryTime.question: How quickly does my shipment reach its destination?
deliveryTime.answer: Standard transport within Germany: 1-2 business days. Europe: 2-5 business days. Express services available same or next day.
